metadata.Title: CVE-2021-26934 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel 4.18 through 5.10.16, as used by Xen. The backend allocation (aka be-alloc) mode of the drm_xen_front drivers was not meant to be a supported configuration, but this wasn't stated accordingly in its support status entry.

notes.Note: sbeattie> the "fix" proposed by Xen is to annotate that this is not a supported configuration.

criterions.comment: linux package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
